alert.note: Alert for Christian; De Witt; Logan; Macon; Marshall; McLean; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 9:42AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A line of showers will bring a burst of strong winds to portions of southeastern Marshall, eastern Logan, central Woodford, northeastern Christian, western De Witt, east central Tazewell, western McLean and western Macon Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 939 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong winds along a line extending from near Lacon to near Stonington. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong showers will be near... Washburn around 945 AM CDT. Varna around 955 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Toluca and Macon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 138 and 156, and between mile markers 158 and 159. Interstate 72 between mile markers 126 and 140. Interstate 74 between mile markers 112 and 126, and between mile markers 131 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Christian; De Witt; Logan; Macon; Marshall; McLean; Tazewell; Woodford
